scripts.setup: npm install && npm link @webscale/core && npm link @webscale/collection && npm link @webscale/collection-redis && npm link @webscale/collection-express-api
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && (mkdir dist || true) && npm run _copy.resources && npm run _copy.schemas && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist/* && (mkdir dist || true) && npm run _copy.resources && npm run _copy.schemas && npm run link && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig.json -w
scripts.watchWin: rm -rf dist/* && (mkdir dist || true) && npm run _copy.resources && npm run link && .\node_modules\.bin\tsc -p tsconfig.json -w
scripts._copy.schemas: for line in $(find src/* -name "*.json"); do mkdir -p dist/${line:4} && rmdir dist/${line:4} && cp ${line} dist/${line:4}; done
scripts._copy.package.json: node -p "var json = require('./package.json'); json.peerDependencies = json.dependencies; delete json.dependencies; delete json.scripts; require('fs').writeFileSync('dist/package.json', JSON.stringify(json, undefined, 2));"
scripts.test: rm -rf dist/* && (mkdir dist || true) && npm run _copy.resources && npm run _copy.schemas && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig.json && ./node_modules/.bin/nyc --reporter=lcovonly mocha "./dist/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.debugTest: rm -rf dist/* && (mkdir dist || true) && npm run _copy.resources && npm run _copy.schemas && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig.json && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha  --inspect-brk=0.0.0.0:9100 "./dist/**/*.spec.js"
